VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
2

Maltreatment in Care
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
Corrective Action Plan Compliance
The agency has submitted 1 acceptable corrective action plans (CAP) during this
licensing period, and compliance with each individual CAP is as follows:
Special investigation 2023C0000599 was completed on 08/08/2023 with findings of
non-compliance relative to youth supervision. A youth was able to escape from the
secure facility due to staff not securing a door allowing youth to exit the building,
and climb a fence. The CAP was approved on 08/23/2023 and the agency
continues to work to bring agency in compliance.
Financial Overview
A financial report dated 8/30/2023 was provided for review. There were no areas of
concern noted for the agency. There were found to be in appropriate financial
position.
PREA compliance (if applicable)
N/A
Chief Administrator Assessment
N/A
Staff and Youth Interviews
A total of six staff were interviewed during the interim evaluation. Overall, the staff
spoke of the agency in a positive manner and expressed pride in the type of care
provided by the agency. Some staff expressed frustration in the number of work
hours due to staffing concerns and further expressed frustration with policy that
requires staff to be mandated to work.
A total of three youth in the program were interviewed. They all spoke in positive
manner regarding the agency and reported the staff are caring and seem to be
concerned about the overall care of the youth. Two of the three youth interviewed
expressed a desire for an increase in food portion sizes.
Description of Agency Walk Through
The agency was found to be in appropriate condition. All basic needs of youth are
being met and appropriate recreation and food options are being provided.
3

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the agency is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules. It is recommended that the agency continue on their regular license.
